須らく: (すべからく) - by all means; in all cases; ought to do
須弥壇: (しゅみだん) - dais for a Buddhist image
須弥山: (しゅみせん) - Mt Sumeru (in Buddhism - said to be the highest mountain rising in the center of the world) (centre)
須恵器: (すえき) - Sue ware (type of unglazed pottery made from the middle of the Kofun era through the Heian era)
須臾: (すゆ) - little while/short while/moment/instant; a while/quite a time; it's been a long time
頌: (しょう) - Elogio, gatha (verso poético de uma escritura)
頌する: (しょうする) - to celebrate someone's achievements
頌春: (しょうしゅん) - Happy New Year
頌歌: (しょうか) - anthem; carol; hymn of praise
預かり: (azukari) - sob custódia, sob supervisão; partida indefinida, empate
預かり人: (あずかりにん) - person left in charge of one's belongings
預かり所: (あずかりしょ) - cloakroom; parcel room
預かり物: (あずかりもの) - something left in charge
預かり証: (あずかりしょう) - claim check; baggage check; luggage check; deposit receipt
預かり資産: (あずかりしさん) - assets on deposit; assets in custody; deposit assets
預かる: (あずかる) - to look after/to take care of/to keep/to hold on to/to keep in custody; to take charge of/to be entrusted with/to receive on deposit; to reserve (judgment)/to leave undecided
預ける: (あずける) - to give into custody/to leave (a child) in the care of/to entrust/to deposit; to lean on/to put one's weight on
預け入れる: (あずけいれる) - to make a deposit
預け物: (あずけもの) - object left in a person's charge
預り: (あずかり) - under custody/under supervision; undecided match/draw/tie
預り証: (あずかりしょう) - claim check; baggage check; luggage check; deposit receipt
預入: (よにゅう) - (usu. used in compound words)  deposit
預参: (よさん) - act of joining a crowd or assembly of people; attendance
預血: (よけつ) - depositing blood (in a blood bank)
預言: (よげん) - (esp. in Christianity and other revealed religions)  prophecy
預言書: (よげんしょ) - prophetic writing (e.g. Biblical); written prophecy
預託: (よたく) - depositing (of money, valuables, etc.); deposition
預託証券: (よたくしょうけん) - {finc} depository receipt
預貯金: (よちょきん) - deposits and savings; bank account
預貯金残高: (よちょきんざんだか) - bank balance
預金保証: (よきんほしょう) - bank deposit guarantee
預金保険制度: (よきんほけんせいど) - deposit insurance system
預金利率: (よきんりりつ) - deposit interest rate
預金残高証明書: (よきんざんだかしょうめいしょ) - bank certificate; bank certification; bank certification of deposit
預金準備率: (よきんじゅんびりつ) - cash-deposit ratio
預金通帳: (よきんつうちょう) - (deposit) passbook; bankbook
頑丈: (ganjou) - sólido, firme, robusto, corpulento, forte, resistente
頑健無比: (がんけんむひ) - (yoji) being of very robust health
頑冥不霊: (がんめいふれい) - (yoji) stubborn and ignorant
頑固一徹: (がんこいってつ) - (yoji) stubborn; obstinate; sticking to one's views or decisions
頑固者: (がんこもの) - stubborn person; bonehead; bullethead; pig-headed person
頑固親父: (がんこおやじ) - (yoji) stubborn (obstinate) father; pig-headed old man
頑張って: (がんばって) - hold on; go for it; keep at it
頑張り屋: (がんばりや) - someone who battles on in difficult circumstances
頑張る: (ganbaru) - to persevere, to persist, to keep at it, to hang on, to hold out, to do one's best; to insist that, to stick to (opinião de alguém) , to persevere, to persist, to keep at it, to hang on, to hold out, to do one's best; to insist that, to stick to (one's opinion); to remain in a place, to stick to one's post, to refuse to budge
頑張れ: (ganbare) - aguente firme, vá em frente, continue firme, dê o seu melhor
頑張ろう: (がんばろう) - pull together!; give it your best shot!; let's do this!
頑是: (がんぜ) - distinction between right and wrong
頑癬: (タムシ) - ringworm (of the body); tinea corporis
頑迷固陋: (がんめいころう) - (yoji) obstinate; stubborn; hard-headed; being incapable of making sound judgments because of a narrow, inflexible and obstinate mentality
頑陋: (がんろう) - stubborn and mean; obstinate and bigoted
頒つ: (あかつ) - (v4t,vt)    to divide/to separate; to share/to distribute
頒白: (はんぱく) - grayish color/greyish colour; grizzled hair
頓て: (やがて) - before long/soon; almost/nearly; finally/in the end/eventually
